Oh god. I can clearly see that. "We are looking at ways to entice more parts of Lee's lore as a former ~~summoner~~ unindentified and mysterious entity that controls champions and magic on the Fields of Justice."

**Passive: **
Summoning portals - ADDED (since Lee has only one passive while there are champions with 2 or even 3 - we can't allow him to fall back somewhere) Using Q or W through the wall will leave a 2-way portal for 5 minutes  that only allies can use. No limit on portal count.

Context: Since Lee falls of late game (as in not dealing assassin-level damage while having tank-level durability), we have decided to add some utility to his kit because he severely lacks in 2 areas.

Flurry - 2 autoattacks now in addition to having increased AS and restoring energy also reduce cooldown of Lee's summoner spells by 10 seconds.

Q - NEW FUNCTIONALITY: Summoner link - Targets hit by Lee's Q are marked for 10 seconds. Lee's summoner spells on the target last 100% longer, have 200% range while he is near them, and the target can't be affected by friendly summoner spells (Heal, Clarity, Barrier).

W - NEW FUNCTIONALITY: Summoner purge - if Lee or his target is affected by a hostile summoner spell (Ignite, Exhaust, CV reveal or upgraded Smite) it's effect is immediately cleansed and the caster takes 30% of their max HP in true damage.

E - ADDED PASSIVE: Summoning sickness - Enemies that Lee kills or assists in killing have their respawn timer increased by 20/40/60/80/100%.

R - ADDED PASSIVE: Summoning distorion - Enemies using Recall within 2000/3500/5000 range of Lee have 50% chance to be teleported into the wrong fountain.
Active: ADDED FUNCTIONALITY - If Lee kicks his target into the portal made by his passive, the target is instantly teleported to Lee's fountain. 

Context: We feel that this change will diferentiate good Lees from great Lees and offer a reward for a skillful combo which offers a lot of counterplay.
